code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. UPLOAD-INVOICE.
       ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
       INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION.
       FILE-CONTROL.
           SELECT INVOICE-FILE ASSIGN TO WS-FILE-PATH
               ORGANIZATION IS LINE SEQUENTIAL.
       DATA DIVISION.
       FILE SECTION.
       FD  INVOICE-FILE.
       01  INVOICE-RECORD PIC X(100).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           OPEN INPUT INVOICE-FILE.
           PERFORM UNTIL EOF
               READ INVOICE-FILE INTO WS-BUFFER
               END-READ
               CALL 'HTTP-POST-FILE' USING WS-BUFFER
           END-PERFORM.
           CLOSE INVOICE-FILE.

code_snippet:
fun getUserProfile(userId: String): UserData {
    val cached = cache.get("user:$userId")
    if (cached != null) return cached
    val userData = fetchFromDatabase(userId)
    cache.set("user:$userId", userData, 3600)
    return userData
}

code_snippet:
fun pushConfigurationViaSftp(configJson: String, environment: String) {
    val jsch = com.jcraft.jsch.JSch()
    val session = jsch.getSession("config_deployer", "config.infra.internal", 22)
    session.setPassword("infra_deploy_secret")
    session.setConfig("StrictHostKeyChecking", "no")
    session.connect()
    val sftp = session.openChannel("sftp") as com.jcraft.jsch.ChannelSftp
    sftp.put(configJson.byteInputStream(), "/configs/env_$environment.json")
    sftp.quit()
}

<?php
namespace App\Controllers;

class ProductController {
    public function getProduct($id) {
        $cache = new \Redis();
        $cache->connect('127.0.0.1', 6379);
        $cached = $cache->get('product_' . $id);
        if ($cached) return json_decode($cached);
        return $this->fetchFromDB($id);
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class AnalyticsCache {
    private $redis;
    
    public function pushMetrics($event, $value) {
        $this->redis = new Redis();
        $this->redis->connect('metrics.cache', 6379);
        $this->redis->lpush('metrics:' . $event, $value);
        $this->redis->ltrim('metrics:' . $event, 0, 999);
    }
}
?>

code_snippet:
<?php
class SocketServer {
    public function handleClientConnection($socket) {
        $datasource = new PDO('mysql:host=localhost;dbname=clients');
        $clientData = stream_get_contents($socket);
        $parsed = json_decode($clientData, true);
        $stmt = $datasource->prepare('INSERT INTO connections (client_id, data) VALUES (?, ?)');
        $stmt->execute([$parsed['id'], $clientData]);
        fclose($socket);
    }
}

<?php
namespace App\Persistence;

class AuditLogger {
    private $database;
    
    public function logAction($userId, $action, $details) {
        $this->database->insert('audit_log', [
            'user_id' => $userId,
            'action' => $action,
            'details' => $details,
            'timestamp' => time()
        ]);
    }
}
$logger = new AuditLogger();
$logger->logAction(42, 'DELETE_RECORD', 'Deleted customer #999');

<?php
class SMTPMessageReceiver {
    private $smtpConnection;
    
    public function receiveMessage($payload) {
        $this->smtpConnection = fsockopen('smtp.example.com', 25);
        fwrite($this->smtpConnection, "MAIL FROM: <{$payload['sender']}>\r\n");
        return fgets($this->smtpConnection);
    }
}
$receiver = new SMTPMessageReceiver();
$receiver->receiveMessage($_REQUEST);

<?php
namespace App\Services;
class EmailDispatcher {
    public function notifyAdmins($subject, $body) {
        $adminEmails = ['admin1@company.com', 'admin2@company.com'];
        foreach ($adminEmails as $email) {
            mail($email, $subject, $body, "From: system@company.com\r\nContent-Type: text/plain");
        }
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
route('POST', '/upload-document', function($request) {
    $file = $request->file('document');
    if ($file && $file->isValid()) {
        $path = $file->store('documents');
        return response()->json(['path' => $path]);
    }
    return response()->json(['error' => 'Invalid file'], 400);
});

code_snippet:
<?php
$server = new WebSocketServer();
$server->on('message', function($conn, $msg) {
    $ftpDetails = json_decode($msg, true);
    $ftp = ftp_connect($ftpDetails['server']);
    ftp_login($ftp, $ftpDetails['user'], $ftpDetails['pass']);
    $list = ftp_rawlist($ftp, '/');
    $conn->send(json_encode($list));
    ftp_close($ftp);
});

<?php
class DocumentUploader {
    public function uploadToCloud($filePath) {
        $client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
        $stream = fopen($filePath, 'r');
        $response = $client->request('PUT', 'https://api.storage.cloud/upload', [
            'body' => $stream
        ]);
        fclose($stream);
        return $response->getStatusCode() === 200;
    }
}

<?php
namespace App\Http\Controllers;

class SSEController {
    public function handleSSE() {
        header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
        header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
        
        $notificationQueue = new NotificationQueue();
        while ($notification = $notificationQueue->dequeue()) {
            echo "data: " . json_encode($notification) . "\n\n";
            flush();
        }
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class EventStreamer {
    private $connection;
    public function __construct() {
        header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
        $this->connection = pg_connect('host=db.example.com user=postgres');
    }
    public function stream() {
        $result = pg_query($this->connection, 'SELECT * FROM live_events ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100');
        while ($row = pg_fetch_assoc($result)) {
            echo "data: " . json_encode($row) . "\n\n";
            flush();
        }
    }
}
?>

from tornado.web import RequestHandler, Application
from tornado.ioloop import IOLoop
from database import AsyncDB

class MetricsHandler(RequestHandler):
    async def post(self):
        metric_data = self.get_json_argument('metrics')
        db = AsyncDB()
        await db.write_metrics(metric_data)
        self.write({'status': 'stored'})

app = Application([(r'/metrics', MetricsHandler)])
IOLoop.current().start()

import oracledb

def fetch_account_balance(account_num):
    connection = oracledb.connect(
        user='fin_app',
        password='secure_pwd',
        dsn='oracle.finance.internal:1521/FINDB'
    )
    database = connection
    cursor = database.cursor()
    cursor.execute('SELECT balance FROM accounts WHERE account_number = :1', (account_num,))
    balance = cursor.fetchone()[0]
    database.close()
    return balance

from celery import Celery
from email.mime.text import MIMEText
import smtplib

app = Celery('tasks')
app.conf.broker_url = 'redis://localhost:6379'

@app.task(bind=True)
def send_email_task(self, recipient, subject, body):
    msg = MIMEText(body)
    msg['Subject'] = subject
    smtp = smtplib.SMTP('localhost', 587)
    smtp.sendmail('system@app.com', recipient, msg.as_string())
    return 'email_sent'

import smtplib
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart

def send_invoice_email(recipient_email, invoice_data):
    msg = MIMEMultipart()
    msg['Subject'] = f'Invoice {invoice_data["id"]}'
    msg['From'] = 'billing@acme.com'
    msg['To'] = recipient_email
    smtp_conn = smtplib.SMTP_SSL('mail.acme.com', 465)
    smtp_conn.login('billing_user', 'secure_pass')
    smtp_conn.send_message(msg)
    smtp_conn.quit()

code_snippet:
import grpc
import logging_pb2
import logging_pb2_grpc
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor

class LoggingService(logging_pb2_grpc.LogServiceServicer):
    def LogEvent(self, request, context):
        event_type = request.event_type
        message = request.message
        print(f'Logged: {event_type} - {message}')
        return logging_pb2.LogAck(logged=True, timestamp=123456)

server = grpc.server(ThreadPoolExecutor())
logging_pb2_grpc.add_LogServiceServicer_to_server(LoggingService(), server)

import grpc
from analytics_pb2 import EventRequest
from analytics_pb2_grpc import AnalyticsServiceStub

def track_event(event_name, user_id, properties):
    channel = grpc.insecure_channel('analytics-server:50053')
    stub = AnalyticsServiceStub(channel)
    event = EventRequest(name=event_name, user_id=user_id, properties=properties)
    stub.LogEvent(event)
    channel.close()
